sentences.en: Age stole onward and benumbed me more and more.
sentences.cn: 年纪渐老使得我(反应)越来越迟钝.

sentences.en: An extra copy of each document was supplied for onward transmission to head office.
sentences.cn: 每份文件都要备一份传给总部.

sentences.en: British Airways have two flights a day to Bangkok, and there are onward flights to Phnom Penh.
sentences.cn: 英国航空公司每天有两个航班飞往曼谷，那里有前往金边的接续航班。

sentences.en: From the turn of the century onward, she shared the life of the aborigines.
sentences.cn: 她自世纪之交以来便同土著居民生活在一起。

sentences.en: His gray beard almost touched the ground as he crept onward.
sentences.cn: 他深猫着腰朝前走着,灰白的胡须几乎触到了地面.

sentences.en: It burns as a will - o'- the - wisp , dancing onward to fairylands of delight.
sentences.cn: 它会像磷火那样发出捉摸不定的光芒, 跳跃着飞向欢乐的仙境.

sentences.en: It'straggled onward into the mystery of the primeval forest.
sentences.cn: 这条小路蜿蜒伸入神秘的原始森林之中.

sentences.en: It'summoned him onward -- inward to the festival!
sentences.cn: 乐声召唤他向前进, 乐声 召唤他去赴宴!

sentences.en: Onward onward, It'saith , and where beauty leads, there it follows.
sentences.cn: 向前,向前, 它催促着, 美走到哪里, 它就追到哪里.

sentences.en: The company offers flights to Amsterdam with onward travel to The Hague.
sentences.cn: 这家公司开设了飞往阿姆斯特丹并续飞海牙的航班。

sentences.en: The travel service can help you to make onward reservations.
sentences.cn: 旅行社可帮您办理行程各阶段的票.

sentences.en: The Yellow River surges onward like ten thousand horses galloping.
sentences.cn: 黄河以万马奔腾之势滚滚向前.

sentences.en: These were the thoughts of the man as he strove onward.
sentences.cn: 这个人一路向前挣扎的时候,脑子里就是这样想的.

sentences.en: Ticket prices include your flight and onward rail journey.
sentences.cn: 票价包括您的飞行航程和接续的铁路旅费。

words.tran_cn: 开着的；发生着的，正在进行中
向前地；作用中，行动中；继续着
向，朝……；关于；在……之上；在……时候
